about_the_game:
You asked for it. Really, you demanded it.

Cretaceous Mongolia. Dinosaurs are here.

This DLC adds the Cretaceous Mongolian Ecosystem to your Tyto Ecology game, opening up a new type of prehistoric biodome you can create with 28 new species!

70 million years ago, the Gobi Desert of Mongolia was not the lonely desert that it is today. In the Cretaceous Period, it was teeming with life! Though still arid and dry, it was home to dinosaurs large and small, tall trees, flowering plants, insects, and even small mammals. Today, the area is rich with dinosaur fossils, many of which belong to species that only existed in Mongolia during the Cretaceous Period.

There are 12 animals (mammals and dinosaurs), 14 plants, 1 decomposer, and 1 pollinator.

CRETACEOUS MONGOLIA ANIMALS:

Deinocheirus
Gallimimus
Deltatheridium
Mononykus
Nemegtosaurus
Oviraptor
Protoceratops
Saurolophus
Tarbosaurus
Therizinosaurus
Velociraptor
Zalambdalestes
Zhangsolvidae (Pollinator)
Termites (Decomposer)


CRETACEOUS MONGOLIA PLANTS:

Araucaria
Cornus
Cycad
Dipteris
Equisetum
Fern
Gingko
Magnoliaceae
Nyssoidea
Platanus
Ranunculaceae
Schizolepidopsis
Trochodendron
Cypress

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.11.2+
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 1536 MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

name: Tyto Ecology - Cretaceous Mongolia

subs.option_text: Tyto Ecology - Cretaceous Mongolia Ecosystem - $1.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit only)
  • Processor: 4th Generation i3 or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 or higher
  • Storage: 840 MB available space

short_description: A dinosaur biodome is here, with the Cretaceous Mongolia! Explore an ecosystem from 70 million years ago as you place velociraptor, therizinosaurus, tarbosaurus, and more!
